scripts.asbuild:small: asc assembly/index.ts assembly/crypto.ts assembly/precomp.ts -b build/small.wasm -t build/small.wat --sourceMap --validate -O3z --importMemory
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts assembly/crypto.ts assembly/precomp.ts -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate -O3 --importMemory
